short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My commands is a tool created for terminal users to store and organize frequently used commands

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key features:
• Copy commands directly from web pages using the context menu (right mouse button)
• Organize your commands into topics and tasks
• Export and import data if needed
• Light and dark themes
• Support for English and Portuguese

Access the github repository:
https://github.com/e7alves/my-commands
